name: Collection
definition: Gathering, obtaining or harvesting of personal data from various sources

name: Recording
definition: Fixing data in tangible medium or electronic storage

name: Organization
definition: Structuring data in retrievable form or database for efficient access

name: Storage
definition: Keeping, maintaining and retaining personal data over time

name: Use
definition: Application or exploitation of personal data for specified purposes

name: Consultation
definition: Reference to or retrieval of personal data

name: Disclosure/Transmission
definition: Making personal data known to other parties or recipients

name: Alignment
definition: Combining, linking or merging personal data from different sources

name: Restriction
definition: Limiting or freezing processing of personal data

name: Erasure
definition: Deletion or destruction of personal data

name: Destruction
definition: Permanent removal of personal data rendering it unrecoverable

name: Anonymization
definition: Making data permanently irreversibly unidentifiable so GDPR no longer applies

name: Pseudonymization
definition: Processing that cannot be attributed to a data subject without additional information

name: Adaptation
definition: Modifying or altering personal data to match specific requirements
